Summary: Hovered and pulsated in sky for about 15 minutes then disappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my front porch around 2am and observed a light hovering by the mountains and was glowing brighter then darker. It was there for about 15 minutes and when me and my friend starting discussing it, it abruptly vanished.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in El Paso
There were no other sightings in El Paso on or around February 8th 2013
